backend/main.mo: Defines core types and in‑memory state for users, products, categories, carts, orders, coupons, referrals, and sample product migration logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking an admin login UI text‑update request to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files including routes, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with a root div and script loading the main React application.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation describing features, tech stack, and setup instructions for local development.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all customer and admin routes with layout and providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin component displaying Stripe configuration status using query hooks and translations.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Home page banner carousel rendering rotating generated images with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Fetches and displays categories in a clickable grid with loading skeletons and navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout rendering header, footer, and outlet while handling Internet Identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header component with navigation, search, theme/language selectors, authentication handling, and cart count display.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Contains skeleton loading components for products, categories, and order rows.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Displays a product card with image, price, stock status, and add‑to‑cart logic.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Renders a product image with a fallback placeholder and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines all React Query cache keys for products, cart, orders, and related data.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to fetch user role and check admin status via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Hooks for fetching cart and wishlist data and mutating cart state.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Hooks to fetch products and categories, with auto‑migration of sample products when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all coupons from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Hooks for retrieving customer orders and polling individual order status.
Fetches referral user IDs for the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Checks if Stripe is configured on the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wrapper hook around next‑themes providing theme state and setter.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Provides translation context with English and Hindi strings and exposes a translation hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Shows category management info with loading state and category count.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Displays coupon management overview with loading state and coupon count.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin dashboard metrics for orders, revenue, and products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Provides admin layout, authentication checks, navigation, and logout handling.
Handles admin login flow with form validation, token storage, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Placeholder page indicating upcoming order management features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages products with search, sorting, filters, and product table display.
Placeholder page indicating upcoming user management features.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, calculates subtotal, and offers navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Implements product catalog with search, filtering, sorting, and category selection.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders checkout flow with shipping placeholder, payment selection, and order summary.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows banner, categories grid, and featured products on the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details after purchase and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Displays the user's order list with loading, empty, and authenticated states, allowing navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Shows detailed information for a specific order, including status, date, total, and item list.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays payment failure message with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a payment success message with options to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed product info, stock status, and actions for adding to cart or wishlist.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder page showing an upcoming address management feature.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Provides the profile layout with authentication check and tabbed navigation for profile sections.
Renders user settings for theme selection and language switching.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Displays the user's wishlist, handling loading, empty state, and product rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature states, issues, and architectural notes for the app.
